sys_ui_macro.name: dropdown
sys_ui_macro.xml: <macro name="time_picker_dropdown"> <select name="time_picker" id="time_picker" class="form-control" required="true"> <option value="">-- Select Time --</option> <option value="08:00 AM">08:00 AM</option> <option value="08:30 AM">08:30 AM</option> <option value="09:00 AM">09:00 AM</option> <option value="09:30 AM">09:30 AM</option> <option value="10:00 AM">10:00 AM</option> <option value="10:30 AM">10:30 AM</option> <option value="11:00 AM">11:00 AM</option> <option value="11:30 AM">11:30 AM</option> <option value="12:00 PM">12:00 PM</option> <option value="12:30 PM">12:30 PM</option> <option value="01:00 PM">01:00 PM</option> <option value="01:30 PM">01:30 PM</option> <option value="02:00 PM">02:00 PM</option> <option value="02:30 PM">02:30 PM</option> <option value="03:00 PM">03:00 PM</option> <option value="03:30 PM">03:30 PM</option> <option value="04:00 PM">04:00 PM</option> <option value="04:30 PM">04:30 PM</option> <option value="05:00 PM">05:00 PM</option> <option value="05:30 PM">05:30 PM</option> <option value="06:00 PM">06:00 PM</option> </select> </macro>
